trans-unit.source: Didn't ask to reset your password?
trans-unit.target: Didn't ask to reset your password?

trans-unit.source: If you didn't ask to reset your password, it's likely that another user entered your username or email address by mistake while trying to reset their password. If that's the case, you don't need to take any further action and you can safely disregard this email.
